pageContent: Purpose: To explore the impact of prostate cancer treatment on: (a) the experience of symptoms (i.e. sexual, urinary, and bowel), and (b) perceived health state of men with prostate cancer one month following their radiation treatment.

metaData.source:
Pelvic radiotherapy and sexual function in men and women
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23387912/
